name: saint
text: ...200 credits we don't have because we had to buy two economy-size cases of damn almonds!

name: juancarlos
text: A comment left by juancarlos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Vondicus, PohlHoud, Saint, wehavemagnums)

name: riazm
text: You have made an error, Cornelius is Obi Wan or at the very least C3PO

name: gormster
text: Dude, Cornelius is Yoda. Badass to the core . Pat should be Vader.

name: saint
text: pat should be dead.

name: pyro_ike
text: Only if Pat is young, annoying Vader, instead of impressive, James Earl Jones Vader.  This is in no small part due to matters of voice.

name: soticoto
text:
Pat IS Vader.
... And by Vader I mean Anakin Skywalker in that he starts sorta innocent, develops into an evil arsehole... and turns gay at the end.

... NOT that he turns out to be Roast Beef's father.

name: zeal
text: Are you people mad?  Pat is completely C-3PO.  The closest thing Achewood has to a villain like Vader is Bensington Butters.  Then again, Nice Pete would make a pretty intimidating Sith Lord...

name: direhaggis
text: I object. Pat is about as polite as fire ants on one's honey-glazed nuts. Arthur is definitely C3P0. Blister is Greedo. Nice Pete would make a good Luke Skywalker in a Willem DaFoe in Last Temptation of Christ' way. Ray with his lion mane on is Chewbacca hell of such as meow. Onstad is Obi-Wan. Onstad has to be Obi-Wan, c'mon.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
speaking of him...

Willem DaFoe versus Gary Busey.

who wins?

name: zombiezero
text: Everybody.  Everybody wins.

name: laserblade
text: Nice Pete is Boba Fett.

name: geysershitdick
text:
Are you sayin' that Pat was married to Roast Beef's mom before his dad was

Cause that is a hella weird thing for a friend to say

name: theryuujin
text: Lie Bot is Vader.  He's more man than machine now...

name: theryuujin
text: all blowing up planets, making young otters cry.

name: ebessan
text:
If anyone is Yoda, it's Ramses.

"Rap mush, do not do with me."

name: cpnglxynchos
text: thee ancient hander of one's asses.

name: tripperday
text:
If we just must travel down this road, Vlad is Vader.

Vlad did to Pat what my cat does to my shoes when I leave for a weekend and forget to turn on his water faucet.

Messing with Vlad is detrimental to any future one would prefer.

name: heccibiggs
text:
His water faucet? Your cat has a water faucet of his own?

I cannot even begin to comprehend this idea.

name: boyd
text: Nice Pete is actually Boba Fett.

name: soticoto
text: Nonsense. Lyle is Boba Fett.

name: soticoto
text: Oh... and Nice Pete is Palpatine to Pat's Vader.

name: sigmacoder
text: I could definitely see Pat killing the younglings.

name: soticoto
text:
... And Onstad himself is Wedge.
He features infrequently, yet persists against all odds.

name: satellitetv
text: Chubby for sheer geeky-ness!

name: tonyhighwind
text:
Ray is Han Solo (Oh, like you gonna go all pro-ice and shoot Greedo first?); Beef is Chewie (If only because the difference in how the character is portrayed would be hilarious); Nice Pete is Vader; Cornelius is Obi-Wan; Rod Huggins is C-3PO; R2D2 is Pat (You know that little droid was spittin' out hell of cusses and just generally being a dick to Threepio); Teodor is Luke; Lyle is Jabba the Hutt; Todd is the little laughing muppet Jabba keeps on the chain; Vlad is Lando, all Andy trailing behind him with the droid half-headband; I'm having trouble with Boba Fett. It would either be Touble Man and No-No teaming up or just cold Ramses Luther, I can't decide.

Anyway, that's my casting call.

P.S. The Tenmen as the Max Rebo band.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Immediate revision:  Beef as Han and Ray as Chewie.  Those two gotta be those two, and Beef as Han means Molly can be Leia.  Ford Galaxie as the Millenium Falcon also seems very pleasing to me.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Immediate revision:  Beef as Han and Ray as Chewie.  Those two gotta be those two, and Beef as Han means Molly can be Leia.  Ford Galaxie as the Millenium Falcon also seems very pleasing to me.

name: scifigrl47
text:
Molly CAN be Leia? Star Wars and Achewood have one thing in common: they've each got ONE GODDAMN GIRL. Who the hell else is going to be Leia? Rod Huggins?

Wait. I kinda like that more. Rod Huggins for Achewood Leia!

name: caseyb3
text:
Before you assign anyone to Han Solo, bear in mind that he was envisioned contemporary to the success of 'Convoy' (song, film) and during the CB radio craze (three-syllable handles traditional).

Han Solo and his good buddy Chewbacca are space truckers.

That is all.

name: powderfinger
text: ya'll some nerds

name: rowboat
text: I'm not gonna lie - I'm a little upset that Google considers this to be the most important assetbar-related use of this phrase. That's just pride fuckin' with me.

name: powderfinger
text: It's second now if that makes you feel any better.

name: rowboat
text: Nothing could make me feel better or worse about anything because nothing could possibly matter, ever. But thanks.

name: rosie
text: Beef is sassy as Luke. Philippe's little grape-stained face and the melting Grapesicle on the sofa is CLASSIC. I love it.

name: lemurthrash
text: R2 has ruined so much of my living room furniture

name: geysershitdick
text: why is Teodor talking through a megaphone

name: epicurus
text: Or possibly it is a comment on how loud Harrison Ford talked in that role. Hella loud.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: because he is darth vader

name: rowboat
text: I don't know why or how, but Teodor is definitely Han Solo.

name: bigdumbtravface
text: You fool. To project his voice with an echo such as a recently-returned-to-the-Force Obi-Wan Kenobi speaking inside of LUKE'S MIND.

name: heccibiggs
text: I assumed it was to sound like he was coming through the ship's communicator thing or whatever. But perhaps this is foolish.

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh, fuck. Try reading the comment that is literally directly below where you're posting next time. I am a toilet seat that smokes a cigar.

name: atticusonline
text: forever that is what you are...

name: phoenixultima
text: My guess is that so his talking sounds like an announcement over an intercom system.

name: petitegitan
text: Beef is the perfect Luke.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Luke was from Circumstances.

name: nathanielperson
text: Phillipe needs to be R2 for Halloween sometime.

name: sargasm
text: Lyle is Chewbacca.  This should be obvious.

name: brillo
text: The fact that they're carrying the roomba is such a revolutionary way to think about vacuuming

name: cailetshadow
text: I'm not sure Beef's Roomba has ever been or ever WILL be used to vacuum something.

name: rowboat
text: Not on purpose, anyway.

name: jesler729
text: Teodor is committed to staying in character.

name: joeyramoney
text: the last panel alone, between phillipes' expression and the use of the word "grapesicle", earns a five all by itself.

name: _cheesekayke
text: Episode 8: Who Stole My Fucking Almonds

name: pseudochron
text: I laughed at the alt text.

name: hcaz
text: A comment left by hcaz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, fosters, rowboat, Ceres, Ebessan, Zem, harry)

name: presterjohn
text:
I'm in a band a Band A BAND BAAAAAAAND
I make music, pay attention to me!

name: i_love_kate
text: Fuck you if this is sincere, but not fuck you if not.

text: phillipe is assigned the character of r2-d2 because they are shaped the same.

text: phillipe ends up serving drinks in jabba the hutt's sail barge.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Thursday Blogs

Roast Beef: Product return at OfficePerfect
Onstad: XM Radio

name: tekende
text: "naked time mats"?

name: mangtastic
text: Could be bath/shower/sex mats.

name: splendorr
text: The mats you put on your furniture when you want to have general-purpose Naked Time, but don't want to contaminate your couch or divan with residual butt particles. I guess not everyone does this.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: I don't even know what to say...that last panel just blindsides me every time. Classic.

name: inthetunk
text: "more space gas" is a five, haha

name: tekende
text: But uh I was going to Toshi Station to pick some dang old power converters I mean I was going to meet my friends there and everything

name: cpnglxynchos
text: 'that fucking guy' is something i wish i had the balls to say more often.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: also, it's my favorite part of this strip.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Are you 9 and afraid of your mother? C'mon man, it ain't that tough, just say that fucking guy .

name: ryanfuss
text: As soon as i saw this first panel i knew it ws going to be a case of checking the overall rating to know if it was funny to Star Wars followers, those nuts can't help but inflict their criticisms. I then read the strip and got the R2 joke immediately, so..ahem...4?

name: ryanfuss
text: Onstad has a very suspicious way of involving the couch in every five star rating i've ever given him. Lyle - "Not on the couch fellas" and now this...the couch is comic prop gold.

name: eidolem
text:
I'm always so surprised when Teodor is anything other than a paragon of virtue, which, yeah, is usually the case. I think it's the turtleneck and the pantaloons.

I'm such a pantaloonist. I hate myself.

name: saintentreri
text: As I read this strip for the first time, I am unknowingly downing a handful of delicious almonds.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: you fucking guy.

name: theguitarhero
text: THAT FUCKING GUY.

name: tekende
text: Unknowingly?

name: carlyle
text: Beef seems shocked to see a grapesicle on the couch.

name: stubob
text: granted, this is the internet; but still too much of this is talking about Star Wars.

name: greenkoolayd
text: onstad needs to talk with the folks at roomba and get a deal going.  get these anthropomorphic critters to make more money for him.

name: offendi
text: Are they standing on Roombas whilst holding Roombas because that would be very silly.
